actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and the Interstate Commerce Act in order to authorize free or reduced rate transportation for persons who are sixty-two years or older.

summary.text: Authorizes free or reduced rate transportation under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and Part I (Railroad Transportation) of the Interstate Commerce Act for persons who are sixty-two years of age or older. (Amends 49 U.S.C., 22, 1373 (b))

titles.title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and the Interstate Commerce Act in order to authorize free or reduced rate transportation for persons who are sixty-two years or older.
